summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 11th avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 70th Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8173 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
